headline: Simple Truth's® Resolution Rescue Bundles Make Keeping New Year's Resolutions Easier Than Ever
summary: Each year, more than half The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) customers set New Year's resolutions, but staying committed to those resolutions takes a lot of effort. That's why Simple Truth®, the brand that makes finding products that are Free From unwanted ingredients easy, is helping customers keep their resolutions on track. Just ahead of Quitter's Day on Friday, January 10 – when most customers begin to give up on their resolutions, Simple Truth® is unveiling six limited-time Resolution Rescue bundles
